descriptions.en: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.
descriptions.es: Presiente desastres inminentes y se aparece a la gente para advertir del peligro.
descriptions.ca: Cada vegada que l'ABSOL apareix davant de la gent, és seguit per un desastre com un terratrèmol o una onada de marea. Com a resultat, es va conèixer com el POKÉMON del desastre.
